nodes.bodyText:
Actually it is:
java [options] -jar filename [args]

So the first -jar should be deleted :) I got myself caught doing the similar mistake and then was wondering why on earth properties are not taken.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -173,7 +173,7 @@ The H2 JDBC driver is included by default. However, users will want to use diffe
 have to provide a `-Dthorntail.classpath` parameter with the path to the JDBC driver.
 
 ```bash
-$ java -jar -Dthorntail.classpath=./mariadb-java-client-2.4.2.jar -jar target/process-migration-thorntail.jar -s./mariadb-config.yml
+$ java -jar -Dthorntail.classpath=./mariadb-java-client-2.4.2.jar target/process-migration-thorntail.jar -s./mariadb-config.yml

nodes.bodyText: Maybe just omit the Resource suffix because it's no longer a JAX-RS resource?
